info.title: Ecomply Anonymize API
info.description: API for anonymizing sensitive information in documents.

post.summary: Anonymize sensitive information in a document
post.description: Upload a PDF or DOCX file to anonymize sensitive information.

parameters.name: file
parameters.description: The file to be anonymized (PDF or DOCX).

400.description: Invalid input or unsupported file type.
